General.Name: Ge Shen Corporation Bhd
General.Description: GE-Shen Corporation Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and trades in plastic molded products, tools and die, metal stampings, and components in Malaysia, Singapore, and Vietnam. The company provides metal and tool fabrication, injection moulding, prototype, metal stamping, liquid silicone rubber, engineering, supply chain and project management, machining, surface finishing, printing, and assembly services. It serves audio; beauty; home and lifestyle; industrial; medical, life sciences, and dental; and office automation and data storage industries. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. GE-Shen Corporation Berhad is a subsidiary of Pelita Niagamas Sdn. Bhd.
